text: Hu'neanagi nagrama avoma krerami'nofina, mago ne'mo'ma Kraisinte namentinti nehue nehuno, monko avu'avaza nehuno, vahe zante kenunu nehuno, havi anumzante mono hunenteno, vahe huhaviza hunenteno, aka ti neno neginagi nehuno, havige huno kumzafa zante hania vahe'enena tragoteta ne'zana onetfa hiho hu'na hu'noe.
